review.title: “Small Company with Big Challenges”
review.pros: Pros – Challenging Environment. Employees will get lots of opportunities to learn and grow. Senior members are highly qualified in various business functions. Office premises and location is really good.
review.cons: Cons – Limited growth. Less number of layers in organization.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
